titleInfo.title: Skyway Drive-In Theaters... Look in Any Window and Giant

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue on orange) showing the Skyway Drive-In film schedule for May 7-13. Presentations include "Look in Any Window"starring Paul Anka and Ruth Roman, "Giant" starring Rock Hudson and Elizabeth Taylor, and double feature films "Bridges of Dracula"and "Leech Women."

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
